archimate:Requirement.name: IR.2.3.5b: b) reviewing potential threat events (e.g. based on whether they can be initiated internally or externally to the organisation and how capable a threat needs to be to initiate the threat event)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
